resources.string: ASM recently set in motion a food pantry for students of UW-Madison. The food pantry is located on 333 East Campus Mall, on the 4th floor of Student Activity Center. ASM accepts donations as well.

F.H. King student organization has a 2-acre farm and a roof-top garden which produces more than 5000 pounds of vegetables every growing season.These vegetables are handed out to students from May to October every Friday at 1pm at East Campus Mall.

Growing Power Madison is actively participating in providing food security and accessibility for the community members of South Madison. Additionally, this is a great educational resource for those interested in urban gardening.
